title: Shilling: job picture isn't as auspicious as headlines suggest
itunes:title: Shilling: job picture isn't as auspicious as headlines suggest
description:
Gary Shilling & Co.'s Gary Shilling discusses his economic outlook ahead of the jobs report on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Barry Ritholtz.
